All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsyncRedisMessageReceivedEvent
Asynchronous Spigot Event class used when message was received from subscribed channel.
BungeeConfigAdapter
Implementation of IConfigurationAdapter for Bungee version
BungeeForestRedisCommand
BungeeCord Command Class for handling ForestRedisAPI commands
ForestRedisBungee
Bootstrap BungeeCord plugin to setup the RedisManager using configuration file.
ForestRedisSpigot
Bootstrap Spigot plugin to setup the RedisManager using configuration file.
IConfigurationAdapter
ConfigurationAdapter interface which handles differences between BungeeCord and Spigot in configuration structure.
IForestRedisPlugin
Generic plugin interface.
IRedisMessageReceivedEvent
Redis incoming message Event interface.
MessageTransferObject
DTO object used for sending data across network.
RedisConfiguration
RedisConfiguration object stores Redis server's credentials.
RedisManager
Class for maintaining and handling connection to Redis server.
RedisMessageReceivedEvent
BungeeCord Event class used when message was received from subscribed channel.
RedisMessageReceivedEvent
Spigot Event class used when message was received from subscribed channel.
SpigotConfigAdapter
Implementation of IConfigurationAdapter for Spigot version
SpigotForestRedisCommand
Spigot Command Class for handling ForestRedisAPI commands
